thread.title: High Court REFUSES permission for judicial review into triggering Article 127 – which would have fought for a ‘soft Brexit’ to keep Britain in the European Economic Area
thread.title_full: High Court REFUSES permission for judicial review into triggering Article 127 – which would have fought for a ‘soft Brexit’ to keep Britain in the European Economic Area

author: Natasha Clark
title: High Court REFUSES permission for judicial review into triggering Article 127 – which would have fought for a ‘soft Brexit’ to keep Britain in the European Economic Area
text:
Opinion now give up! High Court REFUSES permission for judicial review into triggering Article 127 – which would have fought for a ‘soft Brexit’ to keep Britain in the European Economic Area 
Theresa May will breathe a sigh of relief after judges rejected claims that there should be ANOTHER vote in Parliament before the UK can come out of the European Economic Area by NATASHA CLARK
